lines.text: Brooks, it's your baby. Do it your own way, your own style, have fun with it. Only, don't screw up the broad's face.
Sel, how come all teenage girls are sex maniacs?
Ha-ha-ha, there's only ONE sex maniac around here.
Oh, yeah? Then, how come a little kid like Marianne is just aching for me? A guy, twice her age.
Three times her age. She doesn't know you're alive.
You know what she called me in the car?
Mr. Wilson. Twice, she called me Mr. Wilson.
Practically begging me to take her to the Gates of Ecstasy.
Oh, hmm, Mr. Wilson, take me to the Gates of Ecstasy, will you? Marianne doesn't want it. I certainly could use it.
